attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For 300 years British Catholics have lived under a Sectarian Monarchy, and its about time, in todays civilised society, that Catholics should have the same rights as Anglicans, Presbyterians, Protestants and even Muslims, who all are able to marry into the Royal Family, and can become King or Queen of Britain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
